newsitem.title: JAPAN: Showa Yokkaichi to shut 90,000 bpd CDU on Sunday.
newsitem.headline: Showa Yokkaichi to shut 90,000 bpd CDU on Sunday.

text.p: Showa Shell Sekiyu KK said on Friday that group refiner Showa Yokkaichi Sekiyu Co Ltd would shut a 90,000 barrels-per-day (bpd) crude distillation unit (CDU) at its Yokkaichi plant on Sunday for maintenance checks.
The topper was scheduled to resume operations on November 5, a Showa Shell spokesman said.
The other topper at the 240,000 bpd plant in central Japan completed a turnaround earlier this year.
Showa Shell, an oil refiner and distributor, is owned 50 percent by the Royal Dutch/Shell Group.
